verses.name: Genesis 22:20
verses.text: And it came to pass after these things, that it was told Abraham, saying, Behold, Milcah, she hath also born children unto thy brother Nahor;

verses.name: Genesis 22:21
verses.text: Huz his firstborn, and Buz his brother, and Kemuel the father of Aram,

verses.name: Genesis 22:22
verses.text: And Chesed, and Hazo, and Pildash, and Jidlaph, and Bethuel.

verses.name: Genesis 22:23
verses.text: And Bethuel begat Rebekah: these eight Milcah did bear to Nahor, Abraham’s brother.

verses.name: Genesis 22:24
verses.text: And his concubine, whose name was Reumah, she bare also Tebah, and Gaham, and Thahash, and Maachah.
